original_text: At that time, people will be saying, ‘We are safe and there is no trouble for us.’ But then, when they are not ready for it, great punishment will suddenly happen to them. It will be impossible for them to run away. Pain will suddenly come to them, like a woman who is giving birth to a baby.
korean_text: 그들이 평안하다, 안전하다 할 그 때에 임신한 여자에게 해산의 고통이 이름과 같이 멸망이 갑자기 그들에게 이르리니 결코 피하지 못하리라

sentences.original_text: and there is no trouble for us'
when they are not ready for it
great punishment will suddenly happen to them
sentences.korean_translation: 큰 벌이 갑자기 그들에게 일어날 것입니다

sentences.original_text: It will be impossible for them to run away
Pain will suddenly come to them
like a woman who is giving birth to a baby
